resources:
LuTextCrypt Settings 2.0
// Titel der Activities Rot13-Verschlüsselung Cäsar-Verschlüsselung9 Vigenere-Verschlüsselung Text in Asci Base64-Verschlüsselung Passwortgenerator
// Hilfemenü in der Main Short description Step 1: Type or paste text to the feald with the headline "input". Step 2: Depending on wich option you selected, put in the required parameters e.g. a key or offset. Step 3: Press the encrypt or decrypt button below a enjoy the result YOU`VE MADE IT :)
// Karten der Main Rot13-Cipher Rot13 is a special kind of Caesar-Cipher. Each Character will be shifted about 13 dights on the ASCII-Table. (very unsecure) Caesar-Cipher All Characters will be shifted about the same count of dights in the ASCII-Table you choosed before. (very unsecure) Vigenere-Cipher Vigener is an upgraee to Caesar. Each Character will be shifted about the count of dights, that the key letter on same places has number on the ASCII-Table. (unsecure) Affine-Cipher Each Character will be converted to numbers, than multipled with value A, an addes to value B. In the End it will be converted back to Character. (not very secure) Feature not available! This Feature is not availaable right now. I am very sorry for that. Atbash-Cipher Each Letter will be converted into one, wich is so far from the border of alphabet like the original. A goes to Z, B to Y and so on. (very unsecure) RSA-Cipher RSA is an asymetric cipher wich uses public key (public for all) to encrypt and private key (only yours) to decrypt. (very secure)
Text to ASCII Each Character will be converted to its value on ASCII Table. Base64-Encoding Encode and decode data with Base64. Passwordgenerator Generate a random password from Uppercase, Lowercase numbers and more. Generate RSA Keypair Generate random public- and privatekey witch are needed to use the RSA-Cipher. Base32-Encoding Encode and decode data with Base32.
AES-Cipher The Advanced Encrypted Standard is a symetric block cipher witch is used e.g. from the U.S. government. Generate AES Key Generate random AES Key witch is needed to unse the AES-Cipher Generate DES Key Generate random DES Key witch is needed to use the DES-Cipher ö
// Beschriftungen der Elemente Input: Output: Key: generare random key Encrypt Decrypt Convert generate from: Lowercase Uppercase Numbers Other Chars Lengh: Generate password Value A: Value B: Lenght of keys: Lenght of key: Filename: default costum Generate KeyPair Generate Key
// Keylengthes 128 Bits
